Relating to designating the County Court at Law No. 6 of El Paso County as the Probate Court of El Paso County and to the assignment of certain judges in El Paso County.
Relating to the boundaries of the El Paso County Water Control and Improvement District-Westway.
Honoring John W. Hood, Jr., on his retirement from the United States Treasury Department.
